sqlMap.select: SELECT @rownum:=@rownum+1 AS ca_nume_fila, anim.co_anim, anim.no_anim FROM (SELECT @rownum:=0) r, animal anim WHERE DATEDIFF(NOW(), fe_nac)>100 AND anim.ti_sexo='H' AND anim.co_anim NOT IN (SELECT co_anim_vaca FROM inseminacion where es_inse=1) AND anim.es_proc_evol = '1' anim.co_anim = #codigoAnimal# anim.no_anim = #nombreAnimal#

SELECT @rownum:=@rownum+1 AS ca_nume_fila, anim.co_anim, anim.no_anim, ( SELECT a.no_anim FROM animal a WHERE a.co_anim = ( SELECT co_anim_toro FROM inseminacion i WHERE i.co_anim_vaca = anim.co_anim AND es_inse='1' ) ) AS no_toro, inse.fe_inse, DATEDIFF(NOW(), inse.fe_inse) nu_dias_pren, TIMESTAMPDIFF(MONTH, DATE_FORMAT(anim.fe_nac,'%Y-%m-%d') ,CURDATE()) nu_mese_part, inse.co_anim_toro FROM (SELECT @rownum:=0) r, animal anim INNER JOIN inseminacion inse ON anim.co_anim = inse.co_anim_vaca INNER JOIN prenez pren ON inse.co_anim_vaca = pren.co_anim WHERE DATEDIFF(NOW(), fe_nac) > 200 AND anim.ti_sexo = 'H' AND anim.es_proc_evol = '3' AND inse.es_inse='1'
SELECT '' ca_nume_fila, co_anim, no_anim, fe_nac FROM animal WHERE ti_sexo='M'
sqlMap.insert: UPDATE animal SET es_proc_evol = #estadoProcesoEvolutivo# WHERE co_anim = #codigoAnimal#

INSERT INTO animal( co_anim, no_anim, fe_nac, ti_sexo, nu_peso, ti_raza, tx_obse, es_proc_evol, id_usua_crea, fe_usua_crea ) VALUES ( #codigoAnimal#, #nombreAnimal#, #fechaNacimiento#, #tipoSexo#, #peso#, #tipoRaza#, #observacion#, '1', #usuarioRegistro#, now() )
